name: Polycanvas
description:
This is a visual novel in which you’re transported to other universes by a mysterious app as you're struggling to decide on an art style for your comic.

There, you meet up with three different people from three respective worlds drawn in different styles - cartoonish, anime and semi-realism. Talk and hang out with each artstyle and know their quirky personality.  See how the story will unfold...

This game was made with 48 hours during UOWMKDU Sem Jam 2022, hosted by UOW Malaysia KDU University College. The theme of the game jam is multi-verse.

•🎨•🎨•  Controls  •🎨•🎨•

To advance through the game, left-click or press the space or enter keys. 

When given multiple choices, left-click to select one. You can also use the arrow keys to select a choice and enter to activate it.

When playing a game, right-click or press the escape key to enter the game menu.
